name: ITTA
summary: Test your limits in ITTA, a bullet-hell, boss-rush style adventure. Armed with her father’s revolver and guided by a strange ghostly cat, a displaced girl must battle her way through impossible trials in search of answers… and peace.
info:
• 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Twin-stick shooter
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020-04-22
  • 官方网站: https://www.ittagame.com/
  • 开发: Glass Revolver
  • 发行: Armor Games Studios
